ygData.subject: Re: Dungeon advice
ygData.msgSnippet: [snip] ... That s odd. I have found it exactly the opposite. The younger I am, level-wise in the group, the more the mobs run straight for me and start
ygData.messageBody:
[snip]
> I find it interesting that you like to be among the highest-ranked in
> the group. I'm exactly the opposite. I much prefer to be one of the
> lowest-ranked. Yeah, I'm weaker, it's much easier for the MOBs to
> kill me, and it's much harder to run, but it seems to me that they
> target me a LOT less. Whenever I'm among the highest-ranked,
> I get pounded incessantly. I'm curious how others feel about it.

That's odd. I have found it exactly the opposite. The "younger" I am,
level-wise in the group, the more the mobs run straight for me and start
"chewing on me" (to quote my husband) whether I'm playing a song or not.
When I've been in the middle or higher end of the group, it hasn't been so
much the case, although, as we all expect, they don't like me healing party
members... at least that's what my experience has been thus far.

==Lady Brangwen Incantare of the 21st Song
===The Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song
====Squire Court of The Guild New Outriders
=====Citizen of the City of Kelethin on Faydwer
======Wife of High Elf Enchanter, Callais Incantare
=======Server: The Rathe
============================================
